name: ASA - Arcane Space Adventures
description:
NASA sans N

A one-man hobby project. Expect more updates, with various environments, a progression system etc.

Featuring

  • Movement and combat by means of fireballs (progression system pending)
  • Planetary exploration (not really that exciting at the moment)
  • Interplanetary travel (currently trivial)
  • Forts with enemies (currently only one fort, with unresponsive enemies)

Controls

  • A, S, D : change viewing mode: local, mixed and system view
  • numpad +, - : zoom in, out in mixed and system view
  • numpad 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 : switch between projection modes
  • regular keys 1, 2, 3, 4 : switch between fireball strengths

Releases

  • 0.1.0 : first release

Features in the works

  • TBD
